home__subtitulo: Full Stack Web Developer, passionate about Frontend development.
acerca_de_mi__text: I am a Full Stack Web Developer. I am currently studying a specialization in Frontend development at Digital House. I build websites that are responsive and user-friendly. Check out some of my work below.  I consider myself a self-taught person. I like to work in a team, and I adapt easily to changes. I'm open to job opportunities where I can learn and grow. I am a hard worker and I am always looking for new challenges. Feel free to contact me if you have any questions.
contactme__text: If you are interested in working with me, or just want to say hello, do not hesitate to contact me. I will be happy to answer you! ü§ó.
contactme__form__mensajeEnviadoTexto: Thank you for contacting me, I will answer you as soon as possible.
contactme__form__mensajeErrorTexto: An error occurred while sending the message, please try again later.
footer__subtitulo: Or you can also contact me through:

projects__info.proyecto__description: This is a web application that allows you to search for characters from the Rick and Morty series, and see their information in detail, as well as their episodes, also you can add them to your favorites.

This is a web application that allows you to create, edit and delete events. Just enter the date and time of the event, the title and a description. Keep track of your events and never forget anything üóì.

This is a web application that allows you to order food. You can view the menu, add products to the cart, remove products from the cart, and place the order. It has a login and register system. Enjoy your food! üçî.
This is a web application that allows you to create, edit and delete notes. Just enter the title and a description. Keep track of your notes and never forget anything üìù.
